casebody.data:
ELIAS M. SPERLING, Respondent, v. WILLIAM C. CONNER, Sheriff, &c., Appellant.

Before Speir and Freedman, JJ.

Decided April 5, 1880. Exceptions heard in first instance at general term. Vanderpoel, Green & Cuming, attorneys, Almon Goodwin, of counsel, for appellant. Henry A. Root, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Exceptions overruled and judgment ordered for the plaintiff upon the verdict, with costs.
